channel.title: Some Questions
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I am setting up Animations for each of my Barrow's weapons so that people aren't tempted to mass-click, and I am wondering how I make it so that an Animation starts, and ends... then in like 5 seconds start again. Is there? Any help appreciated, thanks.
Q #2.) Okay, second question, i've made something like this: [code] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716)and I want to be able to make it so that if a player meets those requirements (wears full dharoks) their max hit goes up by 30 .... how can i do that?[/code]
Will anybody please tell me how to do this????
Q #3.) Third question, is there a list of animations out there somewhere that lists and shows what all the animations do or how do I find them out?
Q #4.) Fourth Question, what do all the numbers in this mean (the first, second, and third)? [code] attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100);[/code]

item.title: Some Questions
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I know to use a Timer, I’m not that dumb, but I’m asking which timer.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 11:19:35 AM[/size][hr]Oh, and thanks lol. HOORAY FOR GOOGLE[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 11:20:06 AM[/size][hr]Also, can I just use a resetanim = (the timer); for the animation timing?

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

#4 - look at the void…

#3 - google it

#2 -
add this to calculatemaxhit()

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716) {
boolean plusThirty = true;
} else {
boolean plusThirty = false;
}

then edit the void so it makes it hit more…

#1 - just use a timer

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

For your second question. To make a certain Object/Weapon hit higher, change the bonus’.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I am setting up Animations for each of my Barrow’s weapons so that people aren’t tempted to mass-click, and I am wondering how I make it so that an Animation starts, and ends… then in like 5 seconds start again. Is there? Any help appreciated, thanks.

Q #2.) Okay, second question, i’ve made something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716)and I want to be able to make it so that if a player meets those requirements (wears full dharoks) their max hit goes up by 30 .... how can i do that?

Will anybody please tell me how to do this???

Q #3.) Third question, is there a list of animations out there somewhere that lists and shows what all the animations do or how do I find them out?

Q #4.) Fourth Question, what do all the numbers in this mean (the first, second, and third)?

attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100);

Read full topic
